body.p: Document tabs are located at the bottom of the application window. They allow you to switch between multiple documents, see relevant document information and do some operations, namely Save, Save As, Save All, Print Draft, Publish, Switch to Text Mode, and Close Document.

li.p: To switch quickly between several opened documents, click their tabs.
To call the context menu for a document, right-click its tab.

fig.title: The right-click context menu for a document tab.

li.p: To see the Filename, Stylesheet and Schema information for a document, move the mouse pointer over the document tab.

fig.title: A tooltip shows the paths to the file, stylesheet and Schema.
